name: Michael J. Mior
content: Michael Mior#BlackLivesMatter Support the Equal Justice InitiativeHomeAbout MeContactBlogPublicationsProjectsYou've reached the personal website of Michael Mior. I'm an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science Department at the Rochester Institute of Technology and director of the Data Unity Lab. I received my PhD from the David R. Cheriton School of Computer Science at the University of Waterloo. To get in touch, send me an email and we'll talk. (Students should contact me using my RIT email.)
